text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires identifying the relevant Moral Right for the failure to credit as the Right of Paternity (s.77 CDPA 1988). The candidate answer explicitly states: 'Moral rights: - Right to be identified as the author (paternity right) \u2013 though this can be waived (you likely didn\u2019t waive it).'
